hymn.title: Pressed out of measure, pressed beyond all length
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Gain from Suffering

layout.singingstanza: Pressed out of mea -- sure, pressed be -- yond all length; Pressed so in -- tense -- ly, seem -- ing be -- yond strength; Pressed in the bo -- dy, pressed with -- in the soul, Pressed in the mind till dark -- some surg -- es roll. God is my hope and God is my joy; He is the re -- sur -- rec -- tion life I en -- joy.

lyrics.stanza: God is my hope and God is my joy; He is the resurrection life I enjoy.
Pressed into liberty where nothing clings, Pressed into faith for hard and hopeless things; Pressed into life, a life in Christ the Lord, Pressed into life, the life of Christ outpoured.
